title: Game freeze occasionally, in task manager League of Legends.exe is not responding

embed.description: MEGA provides free cloud storage with convenient and powerful always-on privacy. Claim your free 50GB now

body:
link to dmp file ^
As title states, game freezes whilst playing and when it does I have to end the task through task manager and restart it to get back in the game.

replies.body: Yep have had the same issue for 1-2 months cant find anything
